heisig_chinese_memo: To complete our farm first, we sow (sprinkle seeds over) the rice field, then we plant the flowers, and finally we plant the corn.
Ru_trainchinese: bì: (графема) заканчивать, завершать; целиком, полностью, весь
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Compare the needles meticulously so you can complete you needle collection with only the best.
humanum_full_description_en:
Oracle from " Tian " from ◎, Bronze from " Tian " from " 𠦒 ", ◎," 𠦒 "are like a stalked net used to hunt birds and beasts. " 𠦒 " is the pictograph of " Bi ". (Refer to Ji Xusheng) The original meaning of " bi " is a hunting net. Zheng Xuan believes that the " bi " is characterized by a small net and a long handle. "Book of Rites. Order "Zheng Xuan said:" indiscriminately small and that of the long handle complete. "" Field "is a signifier, representing hunting-related. The character " Bi " on the bamboo slips of Baoshan Chu is superimposed with " net " as a sign.

"Said Wen": "Bi, Tian Ziye. From 𠦒, like Bi Xingwei Ye. Or said: Bengsheng." Duan Yucai changed to "Tian Wangye. From Tian, from 𠦒 pictogram. Or said: Tian Sheng "Note: "It is the net of Tianhun." "Mao Chuan of "Xiaoya" said: "Complete, so hide the rabbit." "Yue Ling" note: "It is small but the handle is long." Press "Mandarin Duck" "Chuan Yun: "You can cover it all." However, you can hide not only the rabbit, but also the bird. It's all over and under.

Jia Jinwen was used as a person's name. "Bi Gong" was Ji Gao, the son of King Zhou Wen. He was called Bi Gong because he was called Bi Di, and he was also the important minister of Zhou Dynasty with Zhou Gong and Zhao Gong. Jinwen is also used as a place name. Zhao Wei: "Appreciate Bitu, Fang Fifty Li." It means that the reward is complete. Tang Lan believes that "Fifty Li Fang" is equal to two thousand five hundred Fang Li ("On the Bronze Inscriptions in the Period of Zhou Zhaowang", "Ancient Character Research" Vol. 2 ). He also pretends to be "毖" to show caution, and Chu Gonghuazhong: "Yu Bi (毖) respectful (awe) Ji", which means I am cautious and awe. "Shuowen": "Well, be careful." (Sun Yirang's "Supplements to Gu Xie")
humanum_short_description_en: Oracle from " Tian " from ◎, Bronze from " Tian " from " 𠦒 ", ◎, " 𠦒 " are like a stalked net used to hunt birds and beasts. " 𠦒 " is the pictograph of " Bi ". (Refer to Ji Xusheng) The original meaning of " bi " is a hunting net.
humanum_full_description:
甲骨文從「田」從◎，金文從「田」從「𠦒」，◎、「𠦒」象用來捕獵鳥獸的有柄的網。「𠦒」是「畢」的象形初文。（參季旭昇）「畢」的本義是捕獵用的網。鄭玄認為「畢」的形制特點是網小而柄長。《禮記．月令》鄭玄注曰：「罔小而柄長謂之畢。」「田」是意符，表示與田獵有關。包山楚簡「畢」字又疊加「网」為意符。

　　《說文》：「畢，田罔也。从𠦒，象畢形微也。或曰：甶聲。」段玉裁改為「田网也。从田、从𠦒象形。或曰：田聲。」注：「謂田獵之网也。」「《小雅》毛傳曰：『畢，所以掩兔也。』《月令》注曰：『罔小而柄長謂之畢。』按《鴛鴦》傳云：『畢掩而羅之。』然則不獨掩兔，亦可掩鳥。皆以上覆下也。」

　　甲金文用作人名，「畢公」是周文王的兒子姬高，因為封於畢地稱為畢公，與周公、召公同為周初重臣。金文又用作地名。召卣：「賞畢土，方五十里。」表示賞賜畢地，唐蘭認為「方五十里」等於二千五百個方里（〈論周昭王時代的青銅銘刻〉，《古文字研究》第2輯）。又通假作「毖」，表示謹慎，邾公華鐘：「余畢（毖）恭威（畏）忌」，意思是說我謹慎敬畏。《說文》：「毖，慎也。」（孫詒讓《古籀拾遺》）
humanum_short_description: 甲骨文從「田」從◎，金文從「田」從「𠦒」，◎、「𠦒」象用來捕獵鳥獸的有柄的網。「𠦒」是「畢」的象形初文。（參季旭昇）「畢」的本義是捕獵用的網。

甲骨文從「 田 」從◎，金文從「 田 」從「 𠦒 」，◎、「 𠦒 」象用來捕獵鳥獸的有柄的網。「 𠦒 」是「 畢 」的象形初文。（參季旭昇）「 畢 」的本義是捕獵用的網。鄭玄認為「 畢 」的形制特點是網小而柄長。《禮記．月令》鄭玄注曰：「罔小而柄長謂之畢。」「 田 」是意符，表示與田獵有關。包山楚簡「 畢 」字又疊加「 网 」為意符。 《說文》：「畢，田罔也。从𠦒，象畢形微也。或曰：甶聲。」段玉裁改為「田网也。从田、从𠦒象形。或曰：田聲。」注：「謂田獵之网也。」「《小雅》毛傳曰：『畢，所以掩兔也。』《月令》注曰：『罔小而柄長謂之畢。』按《鴛鴦》傳云：『畢掩而羅之。』然則不獨掩兔，亦可掩鳥。皆以上覆下也。」 甲金文用作人名，「畢公」是周文王的兒子姬高，因為封於畢地稱為畢公，與周公、召公同為周初重臣。金文又用作地名。召卣：「賞畢土，方五十里。」表示賞賜畢地，唐蘭認為「方五十里」等於二千五百個方里（〈論周昭王時代的青銅銘刻〉，《古文字研究》第2輯）。又通假作「 毖 」，表示謹慎，邾公華鐘：「余畢（毖）恭威（畏）忌」，意思是說我謹慎敬畏。《說文》：「毖，慎也。」（孫詒讓《古籀拾遺》）

畢字的基本解释

畢
bì
见“毕”。

畢字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bì］
［《廣韻》卑吉切，去質，幫。］
“毕1”的繁体字。亦作“鏎1”。
(1)统统；全部。
(2)齐备；统括。
(3)完成；完结。
(4)竭尽；用尽。
(5)迅捷。
(6)古时田猎用的长柄网。
(7)指用网捕捉。
(8)星名。二十八宿之一，为白虎七宿的第五宿。有星八颗，以其分布之状像古代田猎用的毕网，故名。古人以为此星主兵、主雨。
(9)以指雨师。
(10)古代用以写字的简。
(11)古代丧祭时，用以举肉的木叉。
(12)通“縪”。缝，缝缀。
(13)通“韠”。古代朝服上的护膝。
(14)通“必”。一定。
(15)月阳之名。
(16)周代诸侯国名。姬姓。为周文王所封，其最早的君主为文王之子毕公高。
(17)姓。春秋晋有毕万。见《左传·闵公元年》。

畢字的康熙字典解释

【午集上】【田字部】　畢； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页761第21
【廣韻】?吉切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】壁吉切，?音必。【博雅】畢，竟也。【書·大誥】子曷敢不于前，寧人攸受休畢。【左傳·莊二十九年】日至而畢。【註】日南至，微陽始動，故土功畢。　又皆也。盡也。【詩·小雅】畢來旣升。【禮·月令】仲春之月，乃修闔扇，寢廟畢備。【註】畢，猶皆也。又【郊特牲】唯爲社田，國人畢作。【疏】畢，盡也。　又月名。【爾雅·釋天】月在甲曰畢。　又星名。【詩·小雅】有捄天畢。【朱註】天畢，畢星也。狀如掩兔之畢。【禮·月令】孟夏之月，日在畢。　又小綱也。【詩·小雅】鴛鴦于飛，畢之羅之。【疏】罔小而柄長謂之畢。【禮·月令】田獵罝罘，羅綱畢翳。【揚雄·校獵賦】荷垂天之畢。　又?也。【爾雅·釋器】?謂之畢。【註】今?札也。【禮·學記】今之敎者，呻其佔畢。【疏】佔，視也。畢，?也。不曉經義，但謳吟長咏，以視篇?而已。　又貫牲。體木也。【禮·雜記】畢用桑。【註】主人舉肉時，以畢助之。喪祭用桑，吉用棘。畢狀如㐅，博三寸，長八寸，柄長二尺四寸，丹漆兩

畢字的源字形

字源演变：

金文楷体

字形对比：

畢字的起名意思

暂无。

complete
Basic explanation of words
complete
bì
See "Bi".
complete
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［bì］
["Guangyun" Beji cut, de-quality, help. ]
The traditional characters of "毕1". Also known as "鏎1".
(1) All; all.
(2) Complete; all in one.
(3) Complete; End.
(4) Exhausted; exhausted.
(5) Swiftness.
(6) The long-handled net used for field hunting in ancient times.
(7) Refers to catching with the net.
(8) Star name. One of the twenty-eight lodgings is the fifth lodging of the white tiger's seven lodgings. There are eight stars, and their distribution resembles the binet used for hunting in ancient fields, hence the name. The ancients regarded this star as the main soldier and the main rain.
(9) To refer to the rain teacher.
(10) Jane used to write in ancient times.
(11) A wooden fork used to lift meat during ancient funeral sacrifices.
(12) Through "縪". Sewing, stitching.
(13) Through "韠". Knee pads on ancient court clothes.
(14) Through "must". for sure.
(15) The name of Yueyang.
(16) The names of the princes of the Zhou Dynasty. Ji's surname. It was awarded by King Wen, whose earliest monarch was Bi Gonggao, the son of King Wen.
(17) Last name. Bi Wan was promoted in the Spring and Autumn Period. See "Zuo Zhuan·The First Year of Min".
complete
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Won Collection 1] [Tian Zi Department] 　 Bi; Kangxi strokes: 11; Page number: Page 761 21
[Guang Yun]? Jiqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] [Zheng Yun] Bijiqie, sound must be. [Bo Ya] After that, it's actually too. [Book·DaGao] Zihao dared not to go ahead, and Ning Renyou was retired. [Zuo Zhuan · Twenty-Nine Years of Zhuang] The end of the day. [Note] When the sun reaches the south, the sun begins to move, and the homeland is completed.　It's all too. Do it all. [Poetry·Xiaoya] Bi Lai Li Sheng. 【Rite·Moon Order】The Moon of Mid-Spring is to repair and close the fan, and the temple is fully prepared. [Note] After that, it's still all. Also 【Special Sacrifice in the Suburbs】It is only for the community, and the people of the country do everything. [Sparse] After finishing, it's all done.　Also the name of the month. 【Erya·Shitian】The moon is finished in Jiayue.　Also star name. [Poetry·Xiaoya] There is a stunned day. [Zhu Note] After the day, Bi Xing also. It looks like the end of a rabbit. 【Rite·Moon Order】Meng Xia’s moon, the sun is over.　It's also Xiao Tsuna. 【Poetry·Xiaoya】Mandarin duck Yufei, Bi Zhiluo. 【Sparse】Sparsely small but with a long handle. 【Rite·Yueling】Tian Liefeng, Luo Gang and Biyi. 【Yang Xiong·School Hunting Fu】The end of the lotus and the sky.　 Again? [Erya·Release Device]? That is the end. [Note] Today? Zha also. 【Ritual·Learning Records】Today’s sacred person, quack it will be completed. 【Sparse】Account, see also. Bi, also. I don't know the meaning of the scriptures, but I chant a long chant, just look at it.　Golden sacrifices again. Body wood also. 【Rite·Miscellaneous】Bi Yongsang. [Note] When the host lifts the meat, he will help it. Mulberry is used for funeral sacrifice, and thorn is used for Ji. Bi Zhuangru 㐅, Bo three inches, eight inches long, handle two feet four inches long, two red lacquer
